JobApplication.title: Job Application
JobApplication.description: Represents a user's tailored application for a specific job.

userId.description: The ID of the user who owns this application.

jobTitle.description: The title of the job, extracted by the AI.

jobDescription.description: The full job description provided by the user.

language.description: The language (e.g., 'French', 'English') the content was generated in.

matchingScore.description: The AI-calculated score (0-100) of how well the resume matches the job.

matchingSkills.description: A list of skills the user has that match the job description.

lackingSkills.description: A list of skills required by the job that are missing from the resume.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the application was created.

/users/{userId}/applications/{applicatio.description: Stores individual job applications for a user.
